title.rendered: How Do I Get An Environmental Activism Internship?

content.rendered:
Environmentalists are concerned with advocating for the protection of the environment. They understand both the importance of preservation and are aware of how human driven actions impact the environment. If your career interests revolve around how to best protect the environment, then consider an internship in environmental activism or environmentalism in general.

What does an environmental activism intern do?

As an environmental intern, you’ll be concerned with the projects that your organization or company are working on. These tasks might include reading and writing briefs, planning and organizing events, researching policies, and other general administrative tasks.

How do I find an environmental activism internship?

If you’re wondering how to get an environmental activism internship for summer 2021, try looking on Handshake under filtered searches like “environmental activism internships near me.” Handshake allows you to focus on employers you want to work for and even network with past interns who may also be alumni from your school. And if you’re looking for an environmental activism internship in a particular location for summer 2021, try searching for openings by using filters like “environmental science internships” or “environmental internship program.”

How do I get an environmental activism internship with no experience?

If you’re interested in getting an environmental activism internship, but have no prior experience, it’s key to play to your strengths and show employers that you’re eager to learn. You can search for environmental internships on Handshake to first get a feel of the requirements they usually list for internships. After that, list your resume and cover letter experiences and previous roles you’ve had where the skills translate over. For example, if you’ve taken an environmental ethics course or have had experience volunteering with a non-profit, mention it and how it relates to your desired role! 

When should I start applying for environmental activism internships?

For most positions, start searching for your internship sooner rather than later! If you are planning to have a summer environmental internship, we recommend starting to look for internship positions no later than the season prior. Many industries prefer to recruit as early as the fall, so staying up to date on fall virtual career fairs will be helpful in securing a role! Each company has different deadlines for applications, so sooner is usually better! If you’re searching for a role during the school year, it’s best to get on applying 3-6 months prior so you can inform your internship of your other obligations and classes.

It’s also really important to keep in mind that your university’s career services center will have great insight about specific recruitment periods at your school. Make sure to sign up for a meeting with your career advisor at the start of the school year for additional help in planning ahead!

How much do environmental activism interns make?

Because the internship roles that require environmental interns vary, there’s no standard answer for an environmental activism internship payscale. If you’re wondering how much your internship will pay, it might be best to inquire directly with the company you’re considering taking an internship with.. Some internship programs will offer only class credits, while many others are more keen to compensate their interns with an hourly rate or a set stipend.

What skills are relevant for environmental activism interns?

  • Strong background in science, or a related field
  • Great communication skills
  • Ability to work both independently and in a team environment

Where do environmental activism interns work?

Environmental activism interns can take their learnings and work into a few different roles like Environmental Scientists, Environmental Engineers, Soil & Plant Scientists, and Foresters & Conversation Scientists. They also can work for many different types of companies, like our constantly growing list of employers hiring now.

How do I write a cover letter for an internship?

Take a look at some great cover letter writing tips to boost your confidence and ace your internship application! And if you need a place to start, try our free cover letter template download here, or reach out to your school’s career center for personalized cover letter guidance.
